experience.title: Research Associate at Ontario Tech University
descriptions: • Coordinated experiments to assess an LLM integrated with a gaze-driven model for enhancing technical video understanding.
• Reviewed critical recorded data to ensure accuracy, and reliability while providing value-add feedback for subsequent analysis.
• Managed participant scheduling and logistics to enable seamless, high-quality data collection.

experience.title: Research Assistant at Ontario Tech University
descriptions: • Developed a mobile augmented reality data visualization application for iPhone and iPad using Swift and XCode, enabling a guided data exploration experience.
• Collaborated with team of researchers to define objectives and implemented features within deadlines, ensuring effective communication and timely delivery.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant at Ontario Tech University
descriptions: • Instructed courses on Web Development, Software Quality Assurance, Mobile App Development, while teaching practical skills.
• Developed lab programs that increased participant comprehension, boosting performance by ~20% across 4 classes.
• Conducted code reviews and one-on-one sessions to help students refine problem-solving and coding practices.
• Resolved technical issues for 100+ learners, ensuring smooth learning through debugging and support.

experience.title: IT Deskside Support at Toronto Hydro
descriptions: • Consulted clients and translated complex technical issues into clear solutions to provide client support, resolving tickets.
• Recommended efficient, cost-effective hardware stock levels by analyzing inventory and building requirements.
• Troubleshooted computer systems and provided tech support to ensure prompt issue resolution and minimize downtime.
• Collaborated with IT teams to leverage collective expertise in accurately diagnosing and resolving client-facing issues.
• Surpassed KPIs for response time with clear communication on ticket progress, ensuring responses within 1-2 hours.

experience.title: Waiter at Swiss Chalet
descriptions: • Ensured customer satisfaction by delivering attentive hospitality and promptly delivering food, beverages and desserts and addressed customer concerns with thoughtful solutions, ensuring an enjoyable dining experience.
• Collaborated with with coworker to provide timely assistance while thriving in high-pressure environments during peak hours, managed multiple tasks and maintained compsure.
• Asssisted with opening and closing tasks, including cleaning and organizing the restaurant.
